|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7731">0xC0208302</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7731">0xC0208302</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7732">-1071611134</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7732">-1071611134</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7734">La version (%1) de l'index de correspondance déjà existant « %2 » n'est pas prise en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7734">The version (%1) of the pre-existing match index "%2" is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7735">La version attendue est « %3 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7735">The version expected is "%3".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7736">Cette erreur se produit si la version qui a persisté dans les métadonnées de l'index ne correspond pas à la version pour laquelle le code actuel a été conçu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7736">This error occurs if the version persisted in the index metadata does not match the version which the current code was built for.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7737">Résolvez cette erreur en recréant l'index à l'aide de la version actuelle du code.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7737">Fix the error by rebuilding the index with the current version of the code.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7738">0xC0208303</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7738">0xC0208303</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7739">-1071611133</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7739">-1071611133</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7741">La table « %1 » ne semble pas constituer un index valide de correspondance avant génération.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7741">The table "%1" does not appear to be a valid pre-built match index.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7742">Cette erreur se produit lorsque l'enregistrement des métadonnées ne peut pas être chargé à partir de l'index avant génération spécifié.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7742">This error occurs if the metadata record cannot be loaded from the specified pre-built index.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7743">0xC0208304</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7743">0xC0208304</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7744">-1071611132</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7744">-1071611132</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7746">Impossible de lire l'index de correspondance avant génération « %1 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7746">Unable to read specified pre-built match index "%1".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7747">Code d'erreur OLEDB : 0x%2!8.8X!.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7747">OLEDB Error code: 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7748">0xC0208305</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7748">0xC0208305</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7749">-1071611131</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7749">-1071611131</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7751">Aucune colonne d'entrée ne comporte une jointure valide vers une colonne de table de référence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7751">There were no input columns with a valid join to a reference table column.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7752">Vérifiez qu'il existe au moins une jointure définie à l'aide des propriétés de la colonne d'entrée JoinToReferenceColumn et JoinType.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7752">Make sure that there is at least one join defined using the input column properties JoinToReferenceColumn and JoinType.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7753">0xC0208306</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7753">0xC0208306</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7754">-1071611130</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7754">-1071611130</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7756">L'index de correspondance déjà existant « %1 » n'a pas été créé à l'origine avec des informations de correspondance approximative pour la colonne « %2 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7756">The specified pre-existing match index "%1" was not originally built with fuzzy match information for column "%2".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7757">Il doit être recréé pour inclure ces informations.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7757">It must be rebuilt to include this information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7758">Cette erreur se produit lorsque l'index a été créé avec une colonne qui n'est pas une colonne de jonction approximative.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7758">This error occurs when the index was built with the column not being a fuzzy join column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7759">0xC0208307</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7759">0xC0208307</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7760">-1071611129</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7760">-1071611129</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7762">Le nom « %1 » attribué à la propriété « %2 » n'est pas un nom d'identificateur SQL valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7762">The name "%1" given for property "%2" is not a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7763">Cette erreur se produit si le nom de la propriété n'est pas conforme aux spécifications d'un nom d'identificateur SQL valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7763">This error occurs if the name for the property does not conform to the specifications for a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7764">0xC0208309</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7764">0xC0208309</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7765">-1071611127</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7765">-1071611127</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7767">La propriété de seuil MinSimilarity sur la transformation de recherche floue doit être une valeur supérieure ou égale à 0.0, mais inférieure à 1.0.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7767">The MinSimilarity threshold property on the Fuzzy Lookup transformation must be a value greater than or equal to 0.0 but less than 1.0.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7768">0xC020830A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7768">0xC020830A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7769">-1071611126</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7769">-1071611126</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7771">La valeur « %1 » de la propriété « %2 » n'est pas valide.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7771">The value "%1" for property "%2" is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7772">0xC020830B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7772">0xC020830B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7773">-1071611125</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7773">-1071611125</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7775">La recherche floue spécifiée entre la colonne d'entrée « %1 » et la colonne de référence « %2 » n'est pas valide car les jonctions approximatives sont uniquement prises en charge entre des colonnes de chaîne, de types DT_STR et DT_WSTR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7775">The fuzzy lookup specified between input column "%1" and reference column "%2" is not valid because fuzzy joins are only supported between string columns, types DT_STR and DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7776">0xC020830C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7776">0xC020830C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7777">-1071611124</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7777">-1071611124</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7779">Les colonnes de recherche exacte « %1 » et « %2 » ne possèdent pas de types de données égaux ou ne constituent pas des types de chaîne comparables.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7779">The exact lookup columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not comparable string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7780">Les jonctions exactes sont prises en charge entre les colonnes qui comportent des types de données égaux ou une combinaison DT_STR et DT_WSTR.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7780">Exact joins are supported between columns with equal data types or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7781">0xC020830D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7781">0xC020830D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7782">-1071611123</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7782">-1071611123</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7784">Les colonnes de copie « %1 » et « %2 » ne possèdent pas de types de données égaux ou ne constituent pas des types de chaîne convertibles de façon triviale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7784">The copy columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not trivially convertible string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7785">Cela se produit car la copie depuis une référence vers une sortie entre des colonnes de types de données égaux ou une combinaison DT_STR et DT_WSTR est prise en charge, mais les autres types ne le sont pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7785">This occurs because copying from reference to output between columns with equal data types, or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination, is supported, but other types are not.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7786">0xC020830E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7786">0xC020830E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7787">-1071611122</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7787">-1071611122</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7789">Les colonnes de relais « %1 » et « %2 » ne possèdent pas de types de données égaux.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7789">The passthrough columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7790">Seules les colonnes comportant des types de données égaux sont prises en charge en tant que colonnes de relais depuis l'entrée vers la sortie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7790">Only columns with equal data types are supported as passthrough columns from input to output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7791">0xC020830F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7791">0xC020830F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7792">-1071611121</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7792">-1071611121</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7794">Colonne de référence « %1 » introuvable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7794">Cannot locate reference column "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7795">0xC0208311</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7795">0xC0208311</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7796">-1071611119</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7796">-1071611119</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7798">Une colonne de sortie doit exactement posséder une propriété CopyColumn ou PassThruColumn spécifiée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7798">An output column must have exactly one CopyColumn or PassThruColumn property specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7799">Cette erreur se produit lorsque les propriétés CopyColumn ou PassThruColumn, ou les deux ensemble sont définies en tant que valeurs non vides.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7799">This error occurs when neither the CopyColumn or the PassThruColumn properties, or both the CopyColumn and PassThruColumn properties, are set to non-empty values.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7800">0xC0208312</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7800">0xC0208312</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7801">-1071611118</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7801">-1071611118</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7803">L’ID de lignage source « %1!d! »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7803">The source lineage id '%1!d!'</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7804">spécifié pour la propriété « %2 » sur la colonne de sortie « %3 » est introuvable dans la collection de colonnes d’entrée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7804">specified for property '%2' on output column '%3' was not found in the input column collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7805">Cela se produit lorsque l'ID de la colonne d'entrée spécifié sur une colonne de sortie en tant que colonne de relais est introuvable dans l'ensemble des entrées.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7805">This occurs when the input column id specified on an output column as a passthrough column is not found in the set of inputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7806">0xC0208313</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7806">0xC0208313</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7807">-1071611117</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7807">-1071611117</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7808">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEXED_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND_IN_REF_TABLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7808">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEXED_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND_IN_REF_TABLE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7809">La colonne « %1 » dans l'index avant génération « %2 » est introuvable dans la table/requête de référence.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7809">The column "%1" in the pre-built index "%2" was not found in the reference table/query.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7810">Cela se produit si le schéma/la requête de la table de référence a été modifié depuis la création de l'index de correspondance déjà existant.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7810">This happens if the schema/query of the reference table has changed since the pre-existing match index was built.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7876">0xC0208322</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7876">0xC0208322</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7877">-1071611102</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7877">-1071611102</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7878">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_TABLE_MISSING_IDENTITY_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7878">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_TABLE_MISSING_IDENTITY_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7879">La table de référence « %1 » ne possède pas d'index cluster sur une colonne d'identité d'entier, ce qui est nécessaire si la propriété « CopyRefTable » possède la valeur FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7879">The reference table '%1' does not have a clustered index on an integer identity column, which is required if the property 'CopyRefTable' is set to FALSE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7880">Lorsque la valeur False est attribuée à la propriété CopyRefTable, la table de référence doit posséder un index cluster sur une colonne d'identité d'entier.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7880">If CopyRefTable is false, the reference table must have a clustered index on an integer identity column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7881">0xC0208323</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7881">0xC0208323</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7882">-1071611101</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7882">-1071611101</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7883">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_CONTAINS_NON_INTEGER_IDENT_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7883">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_REF_CONTAINS_NON_INTEGER_IDENT_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7884">La table de référence « %1 » contient une colonne d'identité de type non entier qui n'est pas prise en charge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7884">The reference table '%1' contains a non-integer type identity column which is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7885">Utilisez une vue de la table sans la colonne « %2 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7885">Use a view of the table without the column '%2'.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7886">Cette erreur se produit lorsqu'une copie de la table de référence est effectuée, qu'une colonne d'identité d'entier est ajoutée, tandis qu'une seule colonne d'identité est autorisée par table.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7886">This error occurs  because when a copy is made of the reference table, an integer identity column is added, and only one identity column is allowed per table.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7892">0xC0208325</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7892">0xC0208325</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7893">-1071611099</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7893">-1071611099</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7894">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_HIERARCHY_INCORRECT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7894">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_HIERARCHY_INCORRECT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7895">Les niveaux dans la hiérarchie doivent être des nombres uniques.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7895">Levels in hierarchy should be unique numbers .</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7896">Un niveau valide dans des valeurs hiérarchiques correspond à des entiers supérieurs ou égaux à 1.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7896">Valid  level in hierarchy values are integers greater than or equal to 1.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7897">Plus le nombre est petit, plus la colonne est située au bas de la hiérarchie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7897">The smaller the number is, the lower the column is in the hierarchy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7898">La valeur par défaut 0 indique que la colonne ne fait pas partie d'une hiérarchie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7898">The default value is 0, indicating that the column is not part of a hierarchy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7899">Les chevauchements et les écarts ne sont pas autorisés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7899">Overlaps and gaps are not allowed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7900">0xC0208326</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7900">0xC0208326</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7901">-1071611098</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7901">-1071611098</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7902">DTS_E_TXFUZZYGROUPING_INSUFFICIENT_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7902">DTS_E_TXFUZZYGROUPING_INSUFFICIENT_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7903">Aucune colonne vers un groupe probable n'est définie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7903">No columns to fuzzy group on were defined.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-7904">Une colonne d'entrée doit au moins exister avec les propriétés de colonne ToBeCleaned=true et ExactFuzzy=2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-7904">There must be at least one input column with column properties ToBeCleaned=true and ExactFuzzy=2.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9689">0x80047076</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9689">0x80047076</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9690">-2147192714</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9690">-2147192714</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9691">DTS_W_UNUSEDOUTPUTDATA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9691">DTS_W_UNUSEDOUTPUTDATA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9692">La colonne de sortie « %1 » (%2!d!) à la sortie « %3 » (%4!d!) et dans le composant « %5 » (%6!d!) n'est pas utilisée par la suite dans la tâche de flux de données.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9692">The output column "%1" (%2!d!) on output "%3" (%4!d!) and component "%5" (%6!d!) is not subsequently used in the Data Flow task.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9693">La suppression de cette colonne de sortie inutile peut augmenter les performances de la tâche Data Flow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9693">Removing this unused output column can increase Data Flow task performance.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9792">0x8020820C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9792">0x8020820C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9793">-2145353204</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9793">-2145353204</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9794">DTS_W_UNMAPPEDINPUTCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9794">DTS_W_UNMAPPEDINPUTCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9795">La colonne d'entrée « %1 » portant l'ID %2!d!</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9795">The input column "%1" with ID %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9796">à l'index %3!d!</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9796">at index %3!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9797">n'est pas mappée.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9797">is unmapped.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9798">L'ID de lignage de la colonne est zéro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9798">The lineage ID for the column is zero.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9799">0x80208305</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9799">0x80208305</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9800">-2145352955</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9800">-2145352955</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9801">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_DELIMITERS_DONT_MATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9801">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_DELIMITERS_DONT_MATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9802">Les séparateurs spécifiés ne correspondent pas à ceux qui sont utilisés pour créer l'index de correspondance préexistant « %1 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9802">The specified delimiters do not match the delimiters used to build the pre-existing match index "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9803">Cette erreur se produit lorsque des séparateurs utilisés pour marquer des champs ne correspondent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9803">This error occurs when the delimiters used to tokenize fields do not match.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9804">Ceci peut avoir des effets inconnus sur le comportement ou le résultat qui correspond.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9804">This can have unknown effects on the matching behavior or results.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9805">0x80208308</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9805">0x80208308</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9806">-2145352952</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9806">-2145352952</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9807">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MAXRESULTS_IS_ZERO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9807">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MAXRESULTS_IS_ZERO</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9808">La propriété MaxOutputMatchesPerInput sur la transformation Fuzzy Lookup a la valeur zéro.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9808">The MaxOutputMatchesPerInput property on the Fuzzy Lookup transformation is zero.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9809">Il n'en sortira aucun résultat.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9809">No results will be produced.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9810">0x80208310</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9810">0x80208310</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9811">-2145352944</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9811">-2145352944</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9812">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9812">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9813">Aucune colonne d'entrée valide ne comporte la propriété de colonne JoinType définie à Fuzzy.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9813">There were no valid input columns with JoinType column property set to Fuzzy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9814">Pour améliorer les performances sur les jointures de type Exact, utilisez la transformation de recherche au lieu de FuzzyLookup.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9814">Performance on Exact joins may be improved by using the Lookup transform instead of FuzzyLookup.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9815">0x8020831C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9815">0x8020831C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9816">-2145352932</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9816">-2145352932</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9818">La colonne de référence « %1 » est peut-être une colonne horodateur SQL.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9818">The reference column "%1" may be a SQL timestamp column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9819">Lorsque l'index de correspondances approximatives est créé et qu'une copie de la table de référence est effectuée, tous les horodateurs de la table de référence reflètent l'état actuel de la table au moment de la copie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9819">When the fuzzy match index is built, and a copy of the reference table is made, all reference table timestamps will reflect the current state of the table at the time of the copy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9820">Un comportement inattendu peut se produire si la table CopyReferenceTable a la valeur False.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9820">Unexpected behavior may occur if the CopyReferenceTable is set to false.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9821">0x80208321</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9821">0x80208321</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9822">-2145352927</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9822">-2145352927</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9824">Une table avec le nom « %1 » attribué à MatchIndexName existe déjà et DropExistingMatchIndex a la valeur FALSE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9824">A table with the name '%1' given for MatchIndexName already exists and DropExistingMatchIndex is set to FALSE.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9825">L'exécution de la transformation échouera, sauf si cette table est supprimée, si un autre nom est spécifié ou si DropExisitingMatchIndex prend la valeur TRUE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9825">Transform execution will fail unless this table is dropped, a different name is specified, or DropExisitingMatchIndex is set to TRUE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9826">0x8020832B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9826">0x8020832B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9827">-2145352917</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9827">-2145352917</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9829">La longueur de la colonne d'entrée « %1 » n'est pas égale à celle de la colonne de référence « %2 » avec laquelle elle est mise en correspondance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9829">The length of input column '%1' is not equal to the length of the reference column '%2' that it is being matched against.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9830">0x8020832D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9830">0x8020832D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9831">-2145352915</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9831">-2145352915</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9833">Les pages de codes de la colonne source DT_STR « %1 » et de la colonne de destination DT_STR « %2 » ne correspondent pas.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9833">The code pages of the DT_STR source column "%1" and the DT_STR dest column "%2" do not match.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9834">Ceci peut engendrer des résultats inattendus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9834">This may cause unexpected results.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9835">0x8020832E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9835">0x8020832E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9836">-2145352914</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9836">-2145352914</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9838">Étant donné qu'il y a plus de 16 jointures de correspondance exactes, les performances risquent de ne pas être optimales.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9838">There are more than 16 exact match joins, so performance may not be optimal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9839">Réduisez le nombre de jointures de correspondance exactes pour améliorer les performances.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9839">Reduce the number of exact match joins to improve performance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9840">SQL Server étant limité à 16 colonnes par index, l'index inversé sera utilisé pour toutes les recherches.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9840">SQL Server has a limit of 16 columns per index, the inverted index will be used for all lookups.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9841">0x80208350</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9841">0x80208350</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9842">-2145352880</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9842">-2145352880</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9844">L'option Exhaustive nécessite le chargement de la référence complète dans la mémoire principale.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9844">The Exhaustive option requires that the entire reference be loaded into main memory.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9845">Étant donné qu'une limite de mémoire a été spécifiée pour la propriété MaxMemoryUsage, il est possible que la table de référence ne puisse pas être contenue entièrement dans cette limite et que l'opération de correspondance échoue au moment de l'exécution.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9845">Since a memory limit has been specified for the MaxMemoryUsage property, it is possible that the entire reference table will not fit within this bound and that the match operation will fail at runtime.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9846">0x80208351</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9846">0x80208351</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9847">-2145352879</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9847">-2145352879</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9848">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHCOLUMNSEXCEEDBYTELIMIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9848">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHCOLUMNSEXCEEDBYTELIMIT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9849">Les longueurs cumulées des colonnes spécifiées dans les jointures de correspondance exacte dépassent la limite de 900 octets pour les clés d'index.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9849">The cumulative lengths of the columns specified in the exact match joins exceeds the 900 byte limit for index keys.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9850">La recherche floue crée un index sur les colonnes de correspondance exacte pour augmenter les performances de recherche et il est possible que la création de cet index échoue et que la recherche fasse appel à une autre méthode, éventuellement plus lente, pour trouver des correspondances.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9850">Fuzzy Lookup creates an index on the exact match columns to increase lookup performance and there is a possibility that creation of this index may fail and the lookup will fall back to an alternative, possibly slower, method of finding matches.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9851">Si les performances posent un problème, essayez de supprimer certaines colonnes de jointure de correspondance exacte ou réduisez les longueurs maximales des colonnes de correspondance exacte de longueur variable.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9851">If performance is a problem, try removing some exact match join columns or reduce the maximum lengths of variable length exact match columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9852">0x80208352</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9852">0x80208352</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9853">-2145352878</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9853">-2145352878</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9854">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHINDEXCREATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9854">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHINDEXCREATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9855">Impossible de créer un index pour les colonnes de correspondance exact.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9855">Failed to create an index for exact match columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9856">Retour à l'autre méthode, la recherche floue.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9856">Reverting to alternative fuzzy lookup method.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9857">0x80208353</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9857">0x80208353</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9858">-2145352877</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9858">-2145352877</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9859">DTS_W_FUZZYGROUPINGINTERNALPIPELINEWARNING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9859">DTS_W_FUZZYGROUPINGINTERNALPIPELINEWARNING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9860">L'avertissement suivant de pipeline interne de regroupement approximatif s'est produit avec le code d'erreur 0x%1!8.8X! : « %2 ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9860">The following Fuzzy Grouping internal pipeline warning occurred with warning code 0x%1!8.8X!: "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9861">0x80208375</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9861">0x80208375</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9862">-2145352843</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9862">-2145352843</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9863">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNLENGTHSETTODEFAULT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9863">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNLENGTHSETTODEFAULT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9864">Aucune longueur maximale n'a été spécifiée pour la %1 avec le type de données externe %2.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9864">No maximum length was specified for the %1 with external data type %2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9865">Le type de données de la tâche de flux de données SSIS « %3 » ayant une longueur de %4!d!</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9865">The SSIS Data Flow Task data type "%3" with a length of %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7d30-9866">sera utilisé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-9866">will be used.</span></span>|

Il se peut également que le nombre de tampons verrouillés soit trop important.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-10248">Either not enough memory is available to the pipeline because not enough is installed, other processes are using it, or too many buffers are locked.</span></span>|

Il se peut également que le nombre de tampons verrouillés soit trop important.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7d30-10257">Either not enough memory is available to the pipeline because not enough are installed, other processes were using it, or too many buffers are locked.</span></span>|
